projects.name: Crowfunding app
projects.description: Created a crowdfunding platform for a startup using MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). Designed user-friendly interfaces with React.js for an exceptional user experience. Managed server development using Node.js and Express.js, achieving 99.9% uptime. Successfully implemented user authentication, resulting in enhanced platform security and user trust.

projects.name: Disease Detection web application
projects.description: Developed an innovative disease detection system utilizing Google Colab, TensorFlow, and deep learning. The model demonstrates high accuracy in detecting COVID-19 and lung opacity from X-ray images. The integration of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) enables precise identification of COVID-19 and lung opacity patterns in X-ray imagery.

experiences.description: During my internship as a Full Stack Developer, I had the invaluable opportunity to work on an exciting project aimed at creating a cutting-edge crowdfunding website using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). The project, catering specifically to startups seeking funding for their innovative ventures, was a fantastic learning experience.
During my internship, I contributed to the development of a website using PHP for the purpose of facilitating food ordering.
